name: BabyWords
0:
”Alexa, open Baby Words”
”Alexa, Baby Words”
”Alexa, let's play Baby Words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby words
des:
Baby Words is a great skill for your child to practice with! Baby Words reads off vocabulary and definitions and rewards your child when they respond correctly.
Baby Words currently has vocabulary lists for:
The days of the week
Colors
Job titles
Animals.

Your child will hear a definition that describes the vocabulary word Alexa is looking for in a way that paints a picture in your child's mind. This is intended to help with creating associations faster.

More vocabulary lists will come in future updates!

Please leave a review if you use our skill ^_^, thank you!
